content: add a trendy touch to your summer wardrobe with the summer stream tee the dropped loop stitches add interest and breathability to the top while short row are used to create a simple and flattering boat neckline this simple summer top consists of two identical body panels the front and back are the same that are worked up in front loop half double crochets dropped loop stitches add a delicate lacy-mesh details but the striking vertical lines elevate this top for a modern and sophisticated vibe there is also a video tutorial for the drop loop stitch sizes xs s m l xl 2x 3x skill level easy+/intermediate
